channel.title: Hoofcast
channel.description: Hoofcast is a comedy sketch show disguised as a podcast starring three comedic geniuses fond of irrelevant, disturbing, and sometimes downright disgusting comedy and pop culture. The most irrelevant comedy podcast on the web!
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Most Irrelevant Comedy Podcast on the Web!!!
channel.itunes:author: HOOFCAST
channel.itunes:summary: Hoofcast is a comedy sketch show disguised as a podcast starring three comedic geniuses fond of irrelevant, disturbing, and sometimes downright disgusting comedy and pop culture. The most irrelevant comedy podcast on the web!

item.title: HOOFCAST 49.5 - The Best of HOOFCAST (Part 2)
item.description: This week your only friends continue to walk down memory lane and make you sad about the shows impending demise. Part 2 focuses mostly on the best bits from season two and the humor that has caused Nigel, Jason and Patrick to end up on the FBI watch list. All your favorites are here in their best and most disturbing moments, including some of our favorite sketches, conversations and in-depth/way too long clips of McConaughey, Patrick's fucked up childhood, and the best of Nantook and Paplo. How could it possibly get any better?!? Probably if it was new suff, eh? ENJOY!!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 49 - The Best of HOOFCAST (Part 1)
item.description: This week our intrepid heroes return to take a look back on the beautifully disturbing show that launched them into complete obscurity. Part 1 focuses mostly on the best bits from season one and the unique humor that has since made Hoofcast a household name. All your favorites are here in their best and most triumphant moments, including some of our favorite sketches, conversations and in-depth/way too long clips of Walken, News with Nigel, and the best of Abraham and Levi. And if that wasn't enough, we assembled all of the kiddy porn name game names together for the first time. How would it be possible for such a self-indulgent podcast not to have a 5-hour-long best of show?!? ENJOY!!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 48 - That Makes One of You
item.description: This week Nigel and Jason are murdered for being annoying bastards, we discuss sexual intercourse while sleeping, chit chat about ghosts, Jean luc Picard hangs out with another member of his crew, a gay gang is started on Craigslist, Patrick calls out Nigel for his negative view of indie bands, Regis tries to pronounce his own name, we count down ten completely random horror movies for some reason and Kareem Salim and Richard go to church. ENJOY!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 47 - Tit Juice
item.description: This week the most racist explorer alive returns, we discuss another way to take a Five Guys Burgers and Fries burger, Nigel tells us something "interesting" about Star Wars, Jigsaw plays Halo, the greatest potential roommate ever puts an ad on Craigslist, in the news a school hands out sex bracelets, Spiderman gets taken down by a broom, and a guy creates his own version of Dennis Nedry's escape from Jurassic Park, we play you another line from the great history of pornography, teach you the proper way to behave in silent social situations, we read a ton of fan mail, and Matthew McConaughey returns to read his final masterpiece. ENJOY!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 46 - Hoofoween II: Hoof Lives!
item.description: This week the ghouls return to scare up another Halloween spookfest!!! The demons stop by for a karaoke jam of the Bo-demon Rhapsody kind, we explain where the hell we've been, introduce a reverse take on Kid Porn Name Game, a guy tries to order a drink at a crowded bar, Dick Steams tells us about his post-Hoofcast career plans, in the news we hear about zombie mold, where Elmo will be this Halloween, where to get your zombie apocalypse supplies, and the fun way to commit suicide, a guy continues to try to order a drink, someone sells Pope hats on Craigslist, Ray Walker continues to be a horrible racist, we discuss our favorite Halloween related guilty pleasures, a guy still can't get a drink, and we create the greatest sequel to a sketch in Hoofcast history! Happy Hoofoween Everybody!! ENJOY!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 45 - Ragin' Steamboat
item.description: This week our newest imaginary sponsor stops by to offer you financial advice, Jason meets his new best friend on a bus ride to nowhere, Nigel tells us something about Star Wars that might give you an aneurism, Captain Picard lets us know about his secret office crush, a guy sells some sort of tires on Craigslist, Dick Steams heads to the father land, we find out that Nigel has no idea what we're talking about when we say the words "Major Motion Picture", and nearly every character ever to appear on Hoofcast appears in one sketch. ENJOY!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 44 - Dogtarded
item.description: This week we start the countdown towards 50 with the greatest episode we've ever done! Or at least a mildly better than average one. Dodge gets some airtime while also reminding us whose in charge, we talk about the demise of the hoof and the beginning of Paste as well as tie up some loose ends we forgot to tell you about, McConaughey tells us about Scooby Doo's favorite pastime, we find out what half a bottle of vodka and Hooters chicken wings can do, we give you 150 BRAND NEW KID PORN MOVIE NAMES, Patrick tells not one but FOUR Patrick's fucked up childhood stories, and we introduce the single most epic rap song in the history of the universe!! Seriously, we're actually going to give you this for free!?! ENJOY!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 43 - Lost Episodes Vol. 4
item.description: This week we find another batch of lost gems with your hosts Walken and McConaughey, Patrick farts in a car, hear a few more great lines in pornographic history, Jason tells us about his love of the Lord of the Rings trilogy, in the news a guy falls off the roof of a car, a guy steals random condiments from a country club, a ferret snacks on some baby fingers, and a guy fingers a chihuahua, Nigel shares a random thought, a guy finds love on Craigslist from a purse theft, a slightly deaf guy reads lines from Scent of a Woman, Jason plays a game on a system you forgot existed, and we finally wrap up Hard Case with an epic conclusion. ENJOY!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 42 - Lost Episodes Vol. 3
item.description: This week we dig up some lost gems that ended up on the cutting room floor from season two so far, Patrick shares some ad's made for another podcast, McConaughey lets you in on a huge hole in the He-Man mythos, a guy has sex with an orange on Craigslist, in the news we learn about a man giving away free condoms, hotels in space, getaway's on a lawnmower, sibling wrench assault, Ochocinco O's, and a great new place to hide your weed, Nigel tells us about Lance Armstrong's newest endorsement, some six year olds send letters to the President, we discuss more pet peeves that make us want to cut a child, and Christopher Walken reads a pornstar's Twitter feed. ENJOY!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 41 - Death on the Road
item.description: This week we provide an alternate version of Scream, discuss Nigel's Facebook account and the usage of male sex toys, Patrick and Satan share a birthday, Mel Gibson calls his bank, we answer real fan mail for a change, Gollum receives a letter from a man who seeks advice about true love, some kids are forced to watch an educational driving film, and the guys reveal the secret locations of lost innocence. ENJOY!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 40 - Hoof Wars
item.description: This week we jump on the Star Wars bandwagon and throw the classic Hoofcast twist on the franchise. A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away Darth Vader got kicked out of a gold course, the guys tried to figure out what happened during Obi Wan Kenobi's lost years, Nigel told a bunch of random Star Wars facts, we reflected on the evolution of John Williams, Jar Jar Bink's got his own show, we chatted about racism in the Star Wars galaxy, Darth Vader went to a grocery store, Nigel told some more random Star Wars facts, we heard an extremely interesting random story, Jason ranted about his hatred for a certain muppet, Nigel told even more random Star Wars facts, Dick Steams went to a convention, we counted down the top 10 reason's George Lucas should be banned from Skywalker Ranch, and Darth Vader took a ride on an elevator. It's force-tastic! ENJOY!!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 39 - You Queeah?
item.description: This week a deaf guy orders an XBox, Patrick lets us know how he spent his Halloween, we finally find out Spock's first name, Regis destroys another celebrity name, the guys let you in on guilty pleasures that might make you think twice about being friends with them, we find out about Patrick's favorite classmate, we give you more than enough material to name your next band, two guys sexually harass a guy at a bus stop, and we try to figure out who would play us in Hoofcast: The Movie. ENJOY!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. item.title: HOOFCAST 38 - Graffiti of the Sea
item.description: This week we expose you to lesser known literary works of art, discover an addiction that is ruining Nigel and Patrick's relationship, Ray Walker accidently stumbles into the happiest kind of parades, Patrick explains the "plot" of the worst film ever made, two Asians share a missed connection on Craigslist, Patrick tells us about another remembered Halloween, his mom kills some fish, and he watches a porno in front of the entire neighborhood, Gary Busey goes to a fast food restaurant, an awkward moment creates new friends, and a racist explorer names a new species of fish. ENJOY!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.description: This week the guys go to a rave, Patrick reminisces about a child molesting serial killer, Nigel has a philosophical thought, Regis stops by to teach us more proper pronunciations, Nigel tells us a cherished childhood account of public nudity, the guys head back for more rave action, a demon goes for his annual physical, we share a random story of the spoils of popcorn and public drunkenness, we head back for one final trip to the rave, and three wise men in their golden years enjoy a quality episode of Walker Texas Ranger. ENJOY!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. item.title: HOOFCAST 34 - A Hoofmas Story (Part II)
item.description: On this very merry Hoofmas eve, there once were…..ah fuck it! No more rhyming. I'm pretty sure no one even reads this shit anyways. Everyone knows what we're gonna do. We do the same old schtick every time we do a special episode! Walken shows up, McConaughey reads something, we usually do a song or something, ugh. How bout a story instead. This guy I know named Carl likes to dress like a bus driver so that I, I mean he can steal sack lunches while the kids go on field trips. Then he likes to sneak into the school and lick the chalk boards! Ha! Lickin' chalk boards, what a freak! i know what you're thinking. You're probably like, "Oh and I bet a kid gets molested. Real funny!" Well you're wrong! No one gets molested and Carl becomes a millionaire because of his ridiculously hilarious podcast! Put that in your pipe and smoke it! ENJOY!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

This guy I know named Carl likes to dress like a bus driver so that I, I mean he can steal sack lunches while the kids go on field trips. Then he likes to sneak into the school and lick the chalk boards! Ha! Lickin' chalk boards, what a freak! i know what you're thinking. You're probably like, "Oh and I bet a kid gets molested. Real funny!" Well you're wrong! No one gets molested and Carl becomes a millionaire because of his ridiculously hilarious podcast! Put that in your pipe and smoke it! ENJOY!!!!
WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 33 - A Hoofmas Story (Part I)
item.description: Once upon a Hoofmas eve, three kings fulfilled a young mans dream. Walken returns in fashion grand, and we interview the number one Hoof-fan. Nigel's obsessions will make you glad, while a man on Craigslist sell's maxi-pads. Three chaps in China have jolly laughs, while an eel eats his way out of a man's ass. Lloyd Davidson travels here and there, as Nantook and Paplo relive a nightmare. There are Christmas pet peeves of the holiday kind, and still Patrick's childhood is just so unkind. Levi is here avoiding the luger, and that one guy is still rambling about his mercury cougar. This episode is so overflowing with holiday cheer, we needed two of them for there was too much to hear. So listen with joy and listen with glee, and remember to spend this Hoofmas having Hoofmasy dreams. ENJOY!!!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. The show contains adult language, situation and other material unsuitable for human ears. In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 25 - Goatastic!
item.description: This week the guys kick off season two with a bang! We explore the lessor known side of Captain Picard, discuss our ideal Batman villain, Patrick talks about his sex life, Walken realizes something we all know isn't true, we discuss the best way to see the Grand Canyon, Gollum stops by to offer advice, we count down the top ten reasons the show isn't live anymore, we find precious items on Craigslist, and two goats try to settle a dispute in the only way goat-possible. Damn it's good to be back! ENJOY!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! What you're about to hear may shock and repulse you to the point of being scared for the very nature of your being. item.title: HOOFCAST 24 - Lost Episodes Vol. 2
item.description: This week we dig up more lost gems in our second lost episode. Patrick talks about a recent trip to Las Vegas, Walken shocks us with his vast knowledge, a guy sells a cherished possession we all take for granted, in the news the Chinese take advantage of those slightly shorter than them, a president in Russia sells secrets to aliens and a women uses her personal squirt guns to assault a prison guard, in pet peeves a bicyclist gets what he deserves, Nigel shares his favorite automotive memory and we discuss personal hygiene, in Patrick's fucked up childhood we hear a horror story that we can't un-hear, and one of our favorite sketches gets it's just deserves. Enjoy!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! The show contains adult language, situations and overall moronic content! In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 23 - Lost Episodes Vol. 1
item.description: This week we rediscover some lost gems in the first ever lost episode of HOOFCAST! Walken finds something everyone has tried to discover, we take a closer look at an over used swear word, in the news shaggy the elf makes an appearence, a snowmobiler is mistaken for an otter, two dogs eat their owner, and the guys rape the Jetson's robot, in pet peeves Patrick reveals his least favorite word, Nigel looks for a quiet place to study, and we talk about pressure in the bathroom, in Patrick's fucked up childhood we hear the exploits of a curious child keen on revenge and pornographic adventures as well as an incredibly disturbing story of mother-son bonding and finally we revisit a time honored fan favorite sketch that'll leave the kids begging for more. Enjoy!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! The show contains adult language, situations and overall moronic content! In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!!

item.title: HOOFCAST 22 - Season Finally!
item.description: This week the guys wrap up season one of HOOFCAST with Walken's return to his rightful throne, a brief history of the show, the guys pick their favorite and least favorite moments of season one, Levi takes his cousin to Red Lobster, Walken lets us know more than we wanted to know about Playdough, McConaughey reads us some Biblical passages, Lloyd Davidson takes a trip to Mount Rushmore, in the news we discover a reason to buy a 3D television and a freezer full of cats, Dick Steams heads to Paris, Patrick recounts battles with a walrus and a tree, Walkendorf returns to Hogwarts, the guys say goodbye for now with a touching letter and the HOOFCAST choir returns to send the show off right. Enjoy!!! WARNING: HOOFCAST is intended for mature audiences only! The show contains adult language, situations and overall moronic content! In other words DON'T LISTEN TO THIS SHOW!!!!
